results.idea: Historical Volatility Gap: subtract(historical_volatility_120, historical_volatility_30)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: gap between long and short realized vols to detect trend. No vector. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: IV Mean Low Absolute Level Filtered by Skew: if_else(less(implied_volatility_mean_60, 0.2), implied_volatility_mean_skew_60, 0)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: act on skew only when IV levels low. No vector. Implementation uses if_else and two fields. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Put IV Term Momentum: ts_rank(subtract(implied_volatility_put_120, implied_volatility_put_30), 60)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: track put term momentum via ts_rank. No vector. Implementation uses two fields. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: IV Mean vs Parkinson (relative zscore): zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_60, parkinson_volatility_60))
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine IV mean and Parkinson to detect option premium anomalies. No vector. Implementation simple and within limits. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term Volatility Reversal by Rank: reverse(quantile(ts_rank(historical_volatility_20,20)))
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_rank and quantile to find reversals in realized vol. No vector. Implementation uses two operators. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: IV Mean Spike Confirmed by Put Rise: and(greater(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,1), 0.02), greater(ts_delta(implied_volatility_put_30,1), 0.02))
results.description: SUGGESTION1: require both IV mean and put IV to spike for stronger signal. No vector. Implementation uses two fields and logical AND. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: IV Short-term vs Long-term Ratio zscore (10d/360d): zscore(divide(implied_volatility_mean_10, implied_volatility_mean_360))
results.description: SUGGESTION1: extreme short/long ratio indicates transient stress. Datafields chosen with good coverage. Implementation uses divide and zscore. Confidence 0.63.
